abstract: focusrite plc increases dividend to gbx 1.95 per share .
article: focusrite plc announced a dividend on tuesday , november 21st , upcoming . co. . uk reports . stockholders of record on thursday , december 28th will be given a dividend of gbx 1.95 per share on friday , january 19th . this represents a dividend yield of 0.6 % . the ex-dividend date of this dividend is thursday , december 28th . this is a positive change from focusrite 's previous dividend of $ 0.75 . the official announcement can be accessed at this link . shares of focusrite remained flat at $ gbx 320 during midday trading on friday .

14,462 shares of the stock traded hands , compared to its average volume of 30,593 . focusrite has a one year low of gbx 195 and a one year high of gbx 337.50 . the stock has a market cap of $ 183.10 and a price-to-earnings ratio of 2,133.33 . in related news , insider timothy paul carrol sold 4,423 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction that occurred on wednesday , november 22nd . the shares were sold at an average price of gbx 307 , for a total value of Â£ 13,578.61 . separately , panmure gordon raised their target price on shares of focusrite from gbx 345 to gbx 365 and gave the company a `` buy '' rating in a report on tuesday , november 21st .

it operates through three segments : focusrite , novation and distribution .
